snippet: The pilot for the ABC nighttime soap “Revenge,” ostensibly set in the Hamptons, was made in and around Southport, N.C., where the real beach house that stars in it is on the market for almost $1.6 million.
abstract: Pilot for the ABC nighttime soap opera Revenge, ostensibly set in Hamptons, was made in and around Southport, NC, where the real beach house that stars in it is on the market for almost $1.6 million.
lead_paragraph: The pilot for the ABC nighttime soap “Revenge,” ostensibly set in the Hamptons, was made in and around Southport, N.C., where the real beach house that stars in it is on the market for almost $1.6 million.

headline.seo: Nose Prints on the Glass: A Beach House’s Star Turn in ‘Revenge’
